headline: American Water to Contribute Expertise to Several Panels at the 2024 NARUC Annual Meeting and Education Conference
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., November 08, 2024--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that three representatives will join regulatory policy panels at the 2024 National Association of Regulatory Utility Commissioners (NARUC) Annual Meeting and Education Conference, taking place November 10 through 13 in Anaheim, Calif.
